overview: Joanna Angel and Tori Lux quest for revenge against the "Pink Pussies", the most bad ass, dangerous bikini gang in the world! When Joanna and Tori concoct a plan to slip a live shark in the Pink Pussies' pool, we'll see who really runs this town. Those blood thirsty bikini sluts are tough, but they aren't tough enough to fight a Japanese cock shark!  Watch these bitches get fucked and eaten...in this hilarious grind house style feature!
title: Bikini Babes are Sharkbait
